questions.question: Water is flowing through pipe. A Piezometer is attached to the pipe as shown in the figure. The height (h) of water column in Piezometer is 7 cm. Find the pressure of the water flowing through pipe.
Water is flowing through pipe. A Piezometer is attached to the pipe as shown in the figure. The height (h) of water column in Piezometer is 5 cm. Find the pressure of the water flowing through pipe.
